install.name: Content - Show / Hide Content
install.author: Milton Pfenninger
install.description: "Show / Hide Content" is a powerfull plugin to show / hide parts of the content. Use {showhide +params}Text to be hidden and shown{/showhide}. See the documentation at www.webconstruction.ch/en/products/docs/sh-content.html

param.name: enabled
param.label: Plugin enabled
param.description: If set to no, the tags get renderd, content is visible and no Javascript is added.

param.name: title
param.label: Title
param.description: Define the default title (if not set) of the Hide/Show Content object.

param.name: changetitle
param.label: Change Title
param.description: Define the default title (if not set), which will change when the Hide/Show Content object is shown/opened.

param.name: image
param.label: Image
param.description: Define the default image (if not set) of the Hide/Show Content object.

param.name: changeimage
param.label: Change Image
param.description: Define the default image (if not set), which will change when the Hide/Show Content object is shown/opened.

param.name: link
param.label: Title as Link
param.description: Define the default way the title will be displayed. If set to Yes, the title will be wrapped as a link.

param.name: mousetitleistitle
param.label: Mousetitle is title
param.description: Define if the title (when hovering over the object-title) is the same as the object-title.

param.name: mousetitle
param.label: Mousetitle
param.description: Defines the default text, which will appear when hovering over the object-title.

param.name: list
param.label: Title as List
param.description: Define the default way the title will be displayed. If set to Yes, the title will be rendered as a list (with ul and li tags).

param.name: htmltitle
param.label: Html Title
param.description: Define the default html of the title. Use [title] as a placeholder for the title.

param.name: changehtmltitle
param.label: Change Html-Title
param.description: Define the default html of the title, when the object is open.

param.name: htmlobject
param.label: Html-Object
param.description: Define the default html of the whole object. Use [object] as a placeholder for the object.

param.name: classsuffix
param.label: CSS class suffix
param.description: Define the default css class suffix (if not set), of the Hide/Show Content object.

param.name: cssfile
param.label: CSS File
param.description: Define the default css file (if not set), which will be included to the page.

param.name: duration
param.label: Duration
param.description: Define the default duration (if not set), of how fast the Hide/Show Content object is opened/closed.

param.name: open
param.label: Open
param.description: Defines if the object is open after loading the page by default.

param.name: openonce
param.label: Open Once
param.description: Define if the object can only be opened once by default.

param.name: hidetitle
param.label: Hide Title
param.description: Hides the title, after the object has been opened by default.

param.name: closeonclick
param.label: Close on Click
param.description: Default of closing the object, if you click on the content.

param.name: hover
param.label: Open by hover
param.description: Define the default way the Hide/Show Content object will open. If set to Yes, the content will be opened/closed when hovering over the title with the mouse. Else the content will be opened/closed, when pressing the mouse button over the title of the Hide/Show Content object.

param.name: horizontal
param.label: Horizontal
param.description: Define the default direction (if not set), of how the Hide/Show Content object is opened/closed. If set to No, the direction is vertical.

param.name: titleasspan
param.label: Span Title
param.description: Defines if the title should be wrapped as span as default, instead of a div.

param.name: template
param.label: Template
param.description: Define the default template (if not set), which should be used for the Hide/Show Content object. Templates are located in the folder plugins/content/showhidecontent/templates

param.name: multitemplates
param.label: Multiple Tempaltes
param.description: Define a comma seperated list for the default templates (if not set), which should be used for the Hide/Show Content object. Templates are located in the folder plugins/content/showhidecontent/templates.
